title: SpaceAPI
description: Read-only JSON API which provides data about space entities such as planets, satellites, comets. Most requests lead to a scrap from other websites like Heavens Above to make it easier fr developers to use their data. Built in Ruby with Sinatra, sources are available on Github rhannequin/space-api.

title: MeetForMeal
description: Annual school project, social network to meet people and eat with them. Allow to find people and restaurants according to hobbies and taste, add as friend, send messages, invite for lunch or dinner, and many. Built in Ruby with Ruby On Rails and third-party APIs such as Google Maps and Foursquare. Nice test-covered with RSpec, Capybara and factory_girl.

title: Web Services
description:
School project around REST, SOAP and web services. Made of 4 different projects:
  • ws-soap-server SOAP server in PHP
  • ws-rest-server REST XML API in NodeJS with Express
  • ws-app main server-side part in Ruby with Sinatra
  • ws-client client-side HTML/JS webapp with Gulp and Browserify

title: Ayouken bot
description: Ayouken is a mix between a bot and an API. ayouken-api is a JSON API which handle requests like displaying a tweet, getting a random gif or looking for documentation on MDN. I'm trying to build other projects to use this API to have a multi-plateform bot, like ayouken-gitter-client for Gitter or ayouken (former project) as an IRC bot. ayouken-api is built in Ruby with Sinatra.

title: Webapp generator
description: This project is -obviously- a webapp generator, with the build system Gulp. It allows to benefit from a nice environment development with tasks like JavaScript linting, livereaload, asset pre-processing and many other. It also make some production tasks very easy like concat, uglify, image optimization.

title: Labo Web ESGI
description: This project is the website of the school association I ruled for years. It was a development-oriented association in which we were able to discuss and present topics around web development. This websites made it easier to create and manage events for students. It was built in Ruby with Ruby On Rails and is well test-covered.

title: Stalkhub
description: Stalkhub is a project to easily retreive information from Github with are not directly available from the plateform. This idea comes from the fact that it can be hard to follow huge open-source projects. Watching issues and pull-requests doesn't make it easy to know what's really changing. Stalkhub can simplify this by showing the last commits of a project since the last visit. Other features are ready to be developed.

title: Countdown Launch
description: Countdown Launch is a very small and useless project. Its only purpose is to create and diplay a countdown for an event. I only made it to have fun with friends with coming dates and events. It was built in Ruby with Ruby On Rails.

title: Foursquare Hack
description: This is a small project based on Foursquare API to retreive restaurants around you. You can restrict the results by giving your own taste or kind of food you want. This was the first part of an idea which was later giving birth to MeetForMeal. It is only made of HTML, CSS and JavaScript.
